message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $90?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $90 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $70 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as low as $70, but I'm willing to compromise. How about $80?
